name: The Maze Runner - Single Level Game
name_original: The Maze Runner - Single Level Game
description:
Hi everyone!

This is my first Unreal Engine 4 game. I wanted to share with you here my experimental game that we prepared as a homework while taking lessons on Unreal Engine. Just unzip the ZIP file and run the EXE file to play. That's it!

In game, press;

R - Reset the game

Esc - Exit the game

My high score ise 3.28 seconds and here is the proof;

Have a nice play and enjoy!
